decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to use cards like Indomitable Creativity and Leyline Binding to combo off and bring out powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty. The deck also utilizes cards like Wrenn and Six, Persist, and Prismari Command to support the combo and control the board. The inclusion of spells like Lightning Bolt, Fire / Ice, and Spell Pierce provides additional interaction and removal options. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent while setting up its combo pieces for a powerful finish.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and disruptive effects from cards like Teferi, Time Raveler. It aims to establish board presence and card advantage through cards like Wrenn and Six, Traverse the Ulvenwald, and Mishra's Bauble. The deck also utilizes powerful creatures like Ice-Fang Coatl and Omnath, Locus of Creation to provide pressure and generate value. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion provides additional card advantage and the ability to reset the board.
